description:
Light Blue Eau Intense Eau De Parfum - A Mediterranean Masterpiece

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense, an enchanting fragrance that transports you to the sun-drenched shores of the Mediterranean. This bestselling 100ml eau de parfum intensifies the iconic Light Blue essence with deeper, more concentrated notes that linger beautifully on the skin. ‚ú®

The Essence of Light Blue Intense

This intense Mediterranean fragrance captures the essence of a summer day by the azure waters of Capri. The signature scent combines crisp citrus notes with a heart of marigold and jasmine, creating an irresistible sensory experience that's both refreshing and sophisticated. üåø

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum (Higher concentration than EDT)
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

Captivating Fragrance Notes of Light Blue Eau Intense

Note Type Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Lemon, Granny Smith Apple üçã
Heart Notes Marigold, Jasmine üå∏
Base Notes Amber Wood, Musk üí´

Key Features of Light Blue Eau Intense

  • More intense and long-lasting than the original Light Blue
  • Perfect for summer days and warm evenings
  • Distinctive citrus character with sophisticated woody undertones
  • Elegant glass bottle with a frosted finish and azure cap
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for both daytime and evening wear

The Heritage of Light Blue

Launched in 2017, Light Blue Eau Intense builds upon the phenomenal success of the original Light Blue fragrance from 2001. Created by master perfumer Olivier Cresp, this new arrival intensifies the Mediterranean character that made the original a global sensation. The iconic blue bottle represents the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean, embodying the carefree spirit of an Italian summer. üíé

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Light Blue Eau Intense last compared to the original?

The Light Blue Eau Intense offers significantly improved longevity compared to the original formulation. While the classic Light Blue typically lasts 4-6 hours, the Eau Intense version can last 7-9 hours on the skin thanks to its higher concentration of fragrance oils and the addition of amber wood in the base notes. This makes it ideal for all-day wear and special occasions where lasting power is essential. üî•

Indulge in the Mediterranean dream with Light Blue Eau Intense ‚Äì where sun-kissed citrus meets sophisticated woody notes in perfect harmony. Experience the essence of Italian summer in every spray. ‚ú®
short_description: Discover Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense, a captivating Mediterranean fragrance with vibrant lemon and apple notes balanced by marigold, jasmine, and amber wood. This intensified version offers enhanced longevity while maintaining the iconic freshness that made Light Blue legendary.
